org.jasig.cas.ticket.registry.support.kryo

Class KryoTranscoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.ticket.registry.support.kryo.KryoTranscoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.spy.memcached.transcoders.Transcoder<java.lang.Object>

    @Component(value="kryoTranscoder")
public class KryoTranscoder
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.spy.memcached.transcoders.Transcoder<java.lang.Object>
    MemcachedClient transcoder implementation based on Kryo fast serialization framework suited for efficient serialization of tickets.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KryoTranscoder()
      Creates a Kryo-based transcoder.
